backend/main.mo: Main canister actor managing user profiles, test attempts, course progress, news caching, and authorization with logic for Day 1 test scoring and unlocking Day 2.
backend/migration.mo: Defines old/new state structures and a simple migration that renames boolMap to progressFlags.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requirements to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing short summaries of various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style definitions with OKLCH variables, theming, and dark mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and mounting the React app root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup defining all routes including Day 1 pages, news, chat, and Pro AI Interviewer.
frontend/src/components/course/StoryMode: Topic card component displaying a story-mode lesson with short story, example, and usage guidance.
frontend/src/components/friendChat/ChatG: Alert component explaining built‑in chat assistant behavior and Power Mode enhancements.
frontend/src/components/news/NewsFallbac: Allows users to input and persist a fallback news URL and view it in an iframe when official news is unavailable.
frontend/src/components/news/NewsItemRow: Displays a news item with TTS controls for reading headlines and previews aloud.
frontend/src/components/news/NewsSection: Shows region-specific news with loading, error, empty states, and fallback browser support.
frontend/src/components/news/TopUSHeadli: Fetches and displays top US headlines with loading, error, empty, and success states.
frontend/src/components/progress/Mistake: Displays learned items and improvement areas based on user progress, with loading handling.
frontend/src/components/proInterviewer/B: Renders a floating microphone button that toggles recording mode with animated UI feedback.
frontend/src/components/test/ResultEffec: Renders animated confetti on a canvas when enabled.
frontend/src/config/newsDataSource.ts: Defines and toggles between demo and backend news data sources.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to user identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAiMode.ts: Determines whether AI mode is enabled based on provider status and handles connection errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useCourseProgress.ts: Hooks for querying and mutating user profile, course progress, day lock status, and test scores via the backend actor using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login/logout handling, and identity persistence using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useInterviewReports.t: Hooks to fetch interview analysis reports and add new analysis entries, with query invalidation on updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalSettings.ts: Manages browser‑local user settings such as API keys, provider enable flags, and computes provider status.
frontend/src/hooks/useMistakeTracker.ts: Loads, stores, and updates mistake‑tracking data from local storage.
frontend/src/hooks/usePowerMode.ts: Manages a locally stored OpenAI key, validates it, and exposes Power Mode activation state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines hooks for fetching and refreshing region‑specific news from the backend, with demo‑mode handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useRegionNews.ts: Fetches, parses, and caches region news with demo‑mode overrides and provides full refresh support.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechToText.ts: Implements browser‑only speech‑to‑text using the Web Speech API with local transcript handling and error reporting.
frontend/src/hooks/useUSNews.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch and refresh US news via an actor instance.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind styles, theme variables, and custom glass and neon utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/course/day1LessonConten: Contains structured Day 1 lesson data including grammar topics and vocabulary words with story-mode examples.
frontend/src/lib/course/day1TestQuestion: Exports a list of multiple‑choice Day 1 test questions focused on Is/Am/Are usage.
frontend/src/lib/course/dayWiseTestGener: Generates Day 1 test questions with topic metadata based on lesson content.
frontend/src/lib/course/essayGrammarChec: Checks essay lines for grammar issues using detectAndCorrect and returns corrections.
frontend/src/lib/course/essayPowerModeFe: Provides enhanced essay grammar corrections, suggestions, and a score using detectAndCorrect.
frontend/src/lib/course/essayScoring.ts: Scores an essay from 0–20 using heuristics on length, sentences, punctuation, and vocabulary.
frontend/src/lib/course/types.ts: Defines shared types for lesson topics, story‑mode sections, and vocabulary words.
frontend/src/lib/friendChat/types.ts: Defines the ChatMessage type used for user and tutor chat entries.
frontend/src/lib/friendTutor/analyzeUser: Analyzes user text for grammar issues, tone, vocabulary level, and power‑answer patterns, returning a structured analysis object.
frontend/src/lib/friendTutor/detectAndCo: Applies regex-based grammar rules to detect and auto-correct common English mistakes, returning corrected text or null.
frontend/src/lib/friendTutor/generatePow: Generates detailed Power Mode tutor replies with safety checks, handling greetings, questions, short messages, and long messages.
frontend/src/lib/friendTutor/generateTut: Produces normal tutor replies based on personality mode with basic safety checks and common conversational patterns.
frontend/src/lib/friendTutor/powerAnswer: Detects simple phrases matching power‑answer rules and suggests stronger vocabulary alternatives.
frontend/src/lib/friendTutor/progressRep: Tracks session statistics and generates a progress report summarizing grammar fixes, tone, vocabulary tips, and power‑ups.
frontend/src/lib/news/demoNewsData.ts: Provides static demo news items for several regions with headlines and previews for development and testing.
frontend/src/lib/news/fallbackNewsUrlSto: Provides get, set, and clear helpers for region‑specific fallback news URLs using localStorage with error handling.
frontend/src/lib/news/parseNews.ts: Parses GNews API JSON, extracts up to 10 cleaned news items, and returns errors or empty results safely.
frontend/src/lib/news/regionConfig.ts: Defines Region type and a list of supported regions with IDs, names, and flags.
frontend/src/lib/news/validateHttpUrl.ts: Validates and normalizes HTTP/HTTPS URLs, returning errors for invalid or unsupported formats.
frontend/src/lib/powerMode/powerModeStor: Handles storing, retrieving, and clearing the local-only OpenAI API key from localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/powerMode/validateOpenA: Validates OpenAI API key format, allowing empty keys and requiring non-empty keys to start with 'sk-'.
frontend/src/lib/progress/mistakeTracker: Provides localStorage read/write helpers for saving and loading mistake tracker lists.
frontend/src/lib/proInterviewer/coachAns: Generates coaching feedback from a transcript including grammar correction, pronunciation hints, and category-based pro tips.
frontend/src/lib/proInterviewer/document: Defines interfaces for uploaded documents, extraction outputs, interview questions, feedback, metrics, and formatting helpers.
frontend/src/lib/proInterviewer/extractT: Returns a failure response for image OCR, indicating manual text entry is required.
Performs basic PDF text extraction using FileReader and returns readable text or fallback messages.
Computes metrics like logic, clarity, filler count, and aggregates them across answers.
frontend/src/lib/proInterviewer/question: Generates interview questions from extracted document data, manual notes, and optional DAF mode.
frontend/src/lib/proInterviewer/sessionR: Builds a session report with scoring, body‑language proxy notes, logical assessment, and improvement areas.
frontend/src/lib/proInterviewer/summariz: Parses text to extract keywords, skills, education terms, roles, and achievement indicators with simple pattern matching.
frontend/src/lib/security/blockOpenAIReq: Implements runtime guards that intercept fetch and XHR to block requests to OpenAI/ChatGPT domains.
frontend/src/lib/security/noOpenAIPolicy: Defines a policy object explaining that OpenAI/ChatGPT integrations are disallowed and lists alternative approaches.
frontend/src/lib/settings/localSettingsS: Manages local-only storage of user settings such as API keys, external links, and provider enable states.
frontend/src/lib/settings/providerStatus: Determines provider connection status based on enable flags and API key validity.
frontend/src/lib/settings/validateKeys.t: Performs lightweight format validation for OpenAI and Gemini API keys without network calls.
frontend/src/lib/tts/speakText.ts: Controls browser text-to-speech playback, handling voice selection, cancellation, and error events.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/ComingSoonPage.tsx: Displays a generic Coming Soon page using a feature param and a return-to-home button.
frontend/src/pages/Day1LearningHubPage.t: Renders Day 1 course content including grammar, vocabulary, essay guidance, and navigation to the test.
frontend/src/pages/Day1TestPage.tsx: Implements the Day 1 test flow with multiple‑choice and essay scoring, result animations, and score submission.
frontend/src/pages/FriendChatPage.tsx: Provides a chat interface with an AI friend, handling text/voice input, grammar correction, and generated tutor replies.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the main navigation hub linking to news, chat, course, tests, progress, and interview features.
frontend/src/pages/MyProgressPage.tsx: Displays completed and unlocked course days, overall progress, and interview report data.
frontend/src/pages/NewsPage.tsx: Shows region‑based news sections with optional refresh and demo‑mode placeholder handling.
Runs the multi‑step AI interview simulator including file upload, info extraction, question generation, answer recording, and session reporting.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: React settings page allowing users to configure API keys, toggles, and local browser‑stored preferences with visual status indicators.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning URL hash values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, animations, shadows, fonts, and container settings for the frontend.
project_state.json: Project state file describing feature requirements, versions, and configuration for a day‑wise testing system.
